author: Reuters Editorial
title: Spain says all non-essential workers must stay home for two weeks to beat coronavirus
description: Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez announced on Saturday that all non-essential workers must stay at home for two weeks, the latest government measure in the fight against coronavirus.
content:
MADRID (Reuters) - Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez announced on Saturday that all non-essential workers must stay at home for two weeks, the latest government measure in the fight against coronavirus. 
He said workers would receive their usual salaries … [+175 chars]
